meta.title: Plumbing Agent ‚Äì WhatsApp intake to paid invoice
meta.description: WhatsApp AI receptionist, Schedule-X calendar and provider-issued invoicing for Dutch plumbing teams. Approve AI proposals, assign in Schedule-X, chase payment via iDEAL.
meta.keywords: plumbing software, whatsapp ai, schedule x, moneybird integration, dutch trades, ideal payments

hero.eyebrow: WhatsApp in. Job booked. Invoice paid.
hero.title: The plumbing ops platform that never sleeps.
hero.subtitle: Dual-number WhatsApp receptionist, Schedule-X v3 calendar and Moneybird/e-Boekhouden/WeFact invoicing in one loop. Dutch-first, GDPR-proof.
hero.trust: Built for 10-person Dutch plumbing teams ¬∑ GDPR + BTW compliant
hero.note: Pilot-ready ¬∑ human approval on every AI action
hero.subhead: Automate intake, planning and invoicing with AI.

ticker.label: Cashflow
ticker.message: Invoice 240913-18 paid via iDEAL ¬∑ Moneybird marked as settled

ticker.label: Planning
ticker.message: AI slotted urgent leak ¬∑ travel buffer respected ¬∑ approved by organiser

ticker.label: Dunning
ticker.message: Reminder #2 scheduled ‚Äì WhatsApp + e-mail with BTW-safe wording

kpis.label: Travel conflict rate on urgent jobs

automation.title: Set it once. Automation keeps working 24/7.
automation.subtitle: Mirror WhatsApp intake, let AI draft the reply, approve the slot and chase payment without leaving the thread.

bullets.title: Dual-number receptionist
bullets.body: Customer number stays templated and compliant; control number loops organiser and plumbers in for approvals.

bullets.title: Travel-safe slot offers
bullets.body: Schedule-X checks buffers, crew load and traffic hints before suggesting a visit. No more double-booking vans.

bullets.title: Provider-based invoicing
bullets.body: Moneybird/e-Boekhouden/WeFact issue the legal PDF & UBL, while we present the timeline, reminders and iDEAL link.

how.title: How the loop runs
how.subtitle: From WhatsApp photo to paid invoice with organiser sign-off at every step.

steps.title: Intake
steps.description: AI reads the WhatsApp transcript, photos and location in Dutch ‚Äì proposes diagnosis, urgency and ETA.
steps.aria: Step 1: AI triages the incoming WhatsApp with photos and drafts the organiser reply.

steps.title: Approve & send
steps.description: Organiser edits or approves the AI draft. Dual-number model keeps the customer thread human-friendly.
steps.aria: Step 2: organiser approves the AI reply before anything reaches the customer.

steps.title: Schedule-X
steps.description: Accepted slot drops straight into Schedule-X week/day views with buffers, conflict striping and colour-coded crew lanes.
steps.aria: Step 3: job is created in Schedule-X with buffers and colour chips.

steps.title: Invoice & dunning
steps.description: Job card feeds Moneybird/WeFact, iDEAL link goes out instantly, reminders follow a BTW-safe cadence.
steps.aria: Step 4: provider issues invoice, Mollie iDEAL link and automated reminders close the loop.

features.title: Built for organisers, crews and finance
features.subtitle: Every surface mirrors the MVP PRP: WhatsApp intake, Schedule-X execution, provider-based invoicing.

cards.title: WhatsApp AI Receptionist
cards.description: Two-number routing, photo intelligence, approvals and compliance with the 24-hour template window.
bullets: Organiser approvals logged with audit trail
Automatic intake of new numbers into CRM

cards.title: Schedule-X v3 calendar
cards.description: Week/day views, drag-to-assign, conflict striping and travel hints optimised for Dutch plumbers.
bullets: Unscheduled drawer fed by AI proposals

cards.title: Headless invoicing
cards.description: Providers own numbering, PDFs and UBL; Plumbing Agent owns UX, reminders and status timeline.
bullets: AI-powered reminder journeys with opt-out respect

demos.title: Try the flow in demo mode
demos.subtitle: Click through the same guardrails your organisers will see. No data is stored.

chat.title: WhatsApp intake
chat.description: AI drafts the reply, organiser approves and the customer stays in WhatsApp.

steps.title: Sent a leak photo
steps.body: Hi, water keeps dripping under the boiler. Can you come today?

steps.title: Diagnosis & duration
steps.body: Likely safety valve. Suggest 45 minutes, one tech. Photo + serial captured for the job card.

steps.title: Approve & clarify
steps.body: Adds question about access, proposes 09:30 slot and keeps travel buffer intact.

calendar.title: Schedule-X v3
calendar.description: Drag the proposal from Unscheduled, watch buffers and conflicts update live.

steps.title: Proposal waiting approval
steps.body: Organiser reviews photo, suggested duration and priority in the bottom drawer.

steps.title: Drop into the route
steps.body: Slot fits between existing visits. 15 min travel buffer, no conflicts.

steps.title: Push to plumbers
steps.body: Crew receives mobile job card with navigation, materials checklist and offline sync.

calendar.unscheduledPrimarySubtitle: Boiler leaking in Haarlem ¬∑ High risk

invoice.title: Provider invoicing
invoice.description: Providers issue the legal artefacts while we show status, reminders and iDEAL link.

steps.title: Draft created
steps.body: Job card lines mapped, Moneybird numbers the invoice and stores PDF/UBL.

steps.title: Delivered
steps.body: WhatsApp + email with iDEAL link and VAT notes. Timeline logs the send event.

steps.title: Viewed
steps.body: Customer opens the payment page; timeline registers the view.

steps.title: Settled via iDEAL
steps.body: Mollie webhook confirms payment and syncs status back to the provider.

liveTicker.empty: Automation stream is quiet right now.

roi.title: ROI calculator
roi.subtitle: Model your own team. No guesswork, just Dutch plumber benchmarks.

body.one: We combine time saved on admin, extra jobs won through instant replies and lower write-offs via compliant reminders.
body.two: Adjust the levers to match your crew size and rates. Numbers below are based on pilot telemetry for 10-person teams.

points.0: WhatsApp response time drops from hours to minutes
points.1: Schedule-X removes double-booked vans and off-hours errors
points.2: Provider-issued invoices clear cash faster with iDEAL

outputs.payback: Payback time with ‚Ç¨349/mo subscription ‚âà 5 booked urgent jobs

testimonials.title: Trusted by Dutch plumbing teams
testimonials.subtitle: Organisers, planners and owners across Noord-Holland are piloting the full loop.

items.name: Annemarie Jansen
items.quote: De AI doet het voorwerk, ik hoef alleen te checken en te versturen. Agenda blijft eindelijk realistisch.

items.name: Sjoerd Willems
items.quote: Facturen gaan rechtstreeks uit Moneybird met iDEAL-link. Klanten betalen binnen een dag en wij houden het overzicht.

items.name: Nathalie de Boer
items.quote: WhatsApp intake staat na 60 seconden in Unscheduled. Geen telefoontjes meer die kwijt raken.
